interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: KaiLeQi 6 Colors Small hair claw clips for women Mini hair claw clips for girls Banana Copper metal hair claw clips Ponytail hairpin Bangs hairpin Hair decoration（6PCS）
Review Date: 2021/02/17
Store: KaiLeQi
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'KaiLeQi', 'Hair Type': 'All, Curly, Straight', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '1.77 x 0.59 x 0.59 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'le0007', 'UPC': '750930312383'}
Review Text: They are really tiny clips, but when they clip on they stay on the hair. I have straight hair and sometimes it's hard to find claw clips that stay on it when I move around because they usually slide down quickly after I put it on. This clip stay on my hair well even with purposely shaking head and jumping. I'm not sure how good the spring will last but so far I'm very satisfied how this clip can hold my hair well.
Review Title: Amazing clips for how small it is
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
MOSTORY 3 in 1 Eyebrow Pencil - Super Model Perfect Brow Stylist Waterproof Brown Eye Brow Makeup Long Lasting Professional Soft Powder Pen Brush (MEDIUM BROWN)
MOSTORY
{'Brand': 'MOSTORY', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 1 x 0.5 inches; 1.59 Ounces'}
This is a warm color eyebrow pencil, it glides out smoothly and very easy to apply. It feels more red than the picture of product, for someone with darker eyebrows like me might need to blend in with another dark color to make it natural. I like the weight of this pencil, it feels nice to grab in palm when using. The fine tip works well to fill in the blank and the powder adds natural final touch.
Smooth eyebrow pencil with rich color
SAMYANG ABOUTME Red Recipe Super Cleansing Balm 3.04 oz. (90ml) - Soft Melting Milk Texture Makeup Cleansing Balm, Mineral Contained Nourishing & Soothing Cleansing, Rose Scented
Samyang
{'Package Dimensions': '3.66 x 3.39 x 2.36 inches; 5.57 Ounces'}
Comes with a small spatula to scoop the product out and apply on the skin. Cleanses make-up well, just simply rub it on the spot and wash it off with water. The rosy fragrance is very pleasant and relaxing. Tested out with black eye-shadow and dark lipbalm and it took them right off with just a small amount applied to the skin.
Rose-like scent and cleanse like a magic
Folora 4pcs Premium 1 Inch Wide Solid Color Floral Plaid Headband Set for Women Girls, Blue-2
Folora
{'Material': 'Plastic', 'Brand': 'Folora', 'Unit Count': '4.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '4.72 x 0.98 x 5.51 inches; 2.26 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'FLR-HB-4pcs Blue-2'}
I like how these 4 all have different patterns yet the color unified them well. I have the blue set and it's quite pretty. The wider style of headband supposed to be more comfortable, but it seems still tight enough to hurt your head a bit after hours of weather. It does have inner layer to make it smoother and easier on your head when you wear it. I assume after a couple of times using/wearing, it should be easier and gets more comfortable.
Sturdy headband, colorful design for the sets
Hair Silk Scrunchies Satin Elastic Hair Bands Velvet Scrunchy Chiffon Hair Ties Ropes Scrunchie for Women Girls Hair Accessories (Laser 1-6PCS)
DEVPSISR
{'Material': 'Silk', 'Brand': 'DEVPSISR', 'Number of Pieces': '6', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult,Kid', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.36 x 4.96 x 1.77 inches; 4.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '791535532882'}
These are definitely fun hair scrunchies, they are rather tight so it works fun even for lower volume hair. It stays on the wrist well until you need to use it, does the job!
Retro color mixed with sci-fi style
Christmas Headbands,Glitter Reindeer Antlers Headband Hair Accessories for Girls,Sequins Mouse Ears Green Bow Hairband for Women Christmas Party Cosplay Favor Headwear
YanJie
{'Material': 'Cotton Blend', 'Brand': 'YanJie', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'UPC': '751300682129'}
The headband fits on nicely, not too tight. Almost a bit loose with the decorations on the head, can't move back and forth too sharp to avoid sliding down. The color is popping even in darker places. The glitter part looks classic and not over the top.
Silky fabric, fun design

profile:
**Updated User Preferences Summary:**

- **Product Type:** The user continues to prioritize makeup products and has shown a notable appreciation for stylish hair accessories, as exemplified by their recent purchase of small claw clips emphasizing a blend of practicality and fashion in their beauty regimen. 

- **Color Preference:** They maintain an affinity for vibrant, warm tones that enhance darker hair, while their accessory choices reflect a playful aesthetic.

- **Application Experience:** Ease of use is a key factor; the user values hair accessories that provide secure hold and comfort during wear, indicating a preference for products that promote a smooth experience.

- **Performance Features:** They prefer durable and effective performance in both makeup and hair accessories. The recent purchase showcases a focus on function, ensuring products remain in place during active use.

- **Sensory Experience:** The user enjoys products with engaging designs, reflecting a penchant for items that are both visually appealing and effective in functionality.

- **Detail Orientation:** Attention to detail is evident in their selection, from the comfortable fit of accessories to their effective use during various activities.

- **Review Behavior:** They approach product evaluation holistically, assessing effectiveness, utility, and sensory characteristics, rather than being swayed by brand loyalty, indicating a thoughtful and practical mindset.

Overall, the user seeks a comprehensive beauty experience emphasizing quality, functionality, aesthetics, and enjoyment in their selections, continuing to enhance their personal style with practical yet trendy items.
